contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 13, 2004 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-third-section
Test Piece Contest
Second Suite in F
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Terry Lax (Soprano cornet) - Radyr and Morganstown Best tenor horn: Seindorf Arian Crwbin Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 8 bands competed.
March 26, 2011, 1:19 p.m. July 2, 2020, 11:34 a.m.
1 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Hann
2 Aberystwyth Youth Band Alan Phillips
3 Severn Tunnel Band Alan MacDonald
4 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
5 Newport Borough Band Mike Davies
6 Crwbin Silver Band Julian Jones
7 Pontypool Brass Jonathan Pippen
8 Oakdale Institute Ron Probyn
